messages.title: Champion for our Communities
messages.content: Elizabeth Riches will fight the Tories' extreme Brexit and be a champion for our communities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Elizabeth will be a pro-Europe MP, fighting to stop the Tories forcing us out of Europe under the worst conditions.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investment in Education and Mental Health
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Elizabeth will campaign for investment in education and mental health.

mentions.tacticalSituation: North East Fife, a constituency where the Tory analysis showed the Liberal Democrats as runaway leaders in last Thursday's (Council election) voting.

issues.brexitEurope: Elizabeth will be a pro-Europe MP, fighting to stop the Tories forcing us out of Europe under the worst conditions.
issues.education: Elizabeth will campaign for investment in education.
issues.health: Elizabeth will campaign for investment in mental health.

community.content: Elizabeth Riches has a long record of fighting and delivering for people in North East Fife.

quotes.text: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit
The Liberal Democrats could be the big winners.
